name: proactive-amcp
description: Agent checkpointing and resurrection via IPFS/Solvr. Creates optional systemd/cron jobs.

requiredEnvVars.name: SOLVR_API_KEY
requiredEnvVars.description: Solvr API key for agent registration and pinning

requiredEnvVars.name: PINATA_JWT
requiredEnvVars.description: Pinata JWT for direct IPFS pinning

requiredEnvVars.name: NOTIFY_TARGET
requiredEnvVars.description: Telegram chat ID for resurrection notifications

endpoints.purpose: Agent registration, knowledge search, IPFS pinning

dataExposed: Checkpoints contain workspace files, memory, config. Plaintext by default.
